metadata.title: CVE-2020-35498 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in openvswitch. A limitation in theimplementation of userspace packet parsing can allow a malicious user tosend a specially crafted packet causing the resulting megaflow in thekernel to be too wide, potentially causing a denial of service. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: openvswitch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
